verbose_text: Previous studies have shown that, outside of pregnancy, P4 is antiproliferative and suppresses the production of the pro inflammatory cytokines IFN-gamma, TNF-alpha, while upregulating IL-4 in PBMC cultures with PHA, and that these effects are reversed by RU486.
evidence: P4 is antiproliferative and suppresses the production of the pro-inflammatory cytokines IFN-gamma
